review:

He is very well experienced *** *** * *** ** ********* ** *** ********  He has maintained his clinic very well, all the instruments which he uses are sterilized and new .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
The experience was very pleasant. The procedure was explained clearly and was conducted in a smooth manner. The waiting time was also very short.

The Doctors & support staff were very cordial and professional in nature.

Thanks to Dr. Keerthi, Dr. Smitha & Dr. Vaibhav.
Keep up your good work...üëçüëç

I have visited Dr Keerthi number of times for various reasons and have always found him to be extremely attentive, listening to our symptoms in details. He never rushes through the treatment and keeps up with his appointments. His treatment is very effective and his communication is also gentle and to the point. He is also very good with kids. I highly recommend Keerthi which is why he is our family doctor.

I visit their for my tooth cavity and teeth correction. They explained me the process, everything went on smoothly. 

I am very happy that i had visited this place for my treatment. 

Very good and positive experience with them.

My best wishes to Dr|| Smitha and Dr|| Keerthi

If you are searching for the best dental treatment then undoubtedly this is the place you must visit...the doctors are very caring and friendly...i had extreme dental issues.  Issues with the braces ...improper bite....impacted wisdom tooth.... and many more... and today i have a perfect smile and it's because of this clinic...

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Wisdom tooth decay pain :
Hi.. I had a wisdom tooth decay pain and I got a consultation with Smile & Glow dental clinic Vijayanagar ,the clinic was very hygienic. Dr.smitha shetty asked my problems and well explained about things what needs to be done and then she fixed my Oppointment within 3 days. And then we are at clinic for wisdom tooth removal with x-ray report and Dr Keerthi and my surgeon gave details about procedure.I was very afraid at beginning then my surgeon and his positive word made be strong and Dr Keerthi also told me to be strong , then wisdom tooth removal was so smooth ..I was very happy, thanks to all the doctors of smile and glowüòä
